titleStmt.title: Labour forbidden, and commanded A sermon preached at St. Pauls Church, September 28. 1634. By Edvvard Rainbovve, fellow of Magdalen Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Rainbowe, Edward, 1608-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Beale] for Nicholas Vavasour, and are to be sold at his shop at the Inner-Temple, neare the Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
